content: at cuff to hide seam on the fold over cuff weave in any ends turn down cuff sole measurement 3 5 /8 5cm for smallest size autumn street patterns www thingsforboys com notes there is no need to w&t when turning mid row for the in step they are not short row i don t bother but you may wish to put the first and last lot of 10 stitches onto stitch holders when working the instep after step 1 of instep abbreviation m1 = make 1 see here for details http //www knittinghelp com/videos/increases i use the m1l video ssk = slip slip knit k2tog = knit 2 stitches together if you prefer you can finish the booties with the wrong sides together this will put the seam on the outside of the baby ugg but may make them more comfortable for babies
